A: 1. Which prophecy was fulfilled by Jesus' birth? (a) Kingdom (b) Birth (c) Agony
2. Which prophet foretold Jesus' birth? (a) Isaiah (b) Jeremiah (c) Daniel
3. Emmanuel means God is always _ (a) With us (b) Caring (c) Giving
4. God protects and guides us (a) True (b) False
5. What's the first name Prophet Isaiah mentioned? (a) Emmanuel (b) Wonderful (c) Counsellor
6. Ask for the Holy Spirit to guide us (a) True (b) False
7. Government shall be upon His _ (a) Hand (b) Head (c) Shoulder
8. His name shall be called _ (a) Wonderful, Counselor, Jehovah (b) Wonderful, Counselor, Mighty God (c) Wonderful, Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace
9. Disciples gathered in _ on Pentecost (a) Bethlehem (b) Rome (c) Jerusalem
10. A _ came from the sky (a) Manner (b) Angel (c) Voice
11. Who is the Holy Spirit? (a) God living in us (b) God's Father (c) God's Commander
12. Was Jesus the Messiah Jews expected? (a) True (b) False
13. Worship God in spirit and in _ (a) Flesh (b) Tongue (c) Truth
14. Was Isaiah's prophecy fulfilled? (a) Yes (b) No
15. Apostles used Holy Spirit to kill enemies (a) True (b) False
16. To be born again means _ (a) Rebirth (b) Baptism (c) Free from poverty
17. A born-again person lives like Christ (a) True (b) False
18. Jesus is the way, truth, life: John _ (a) 3:16 (b) 4:12 (c) 14:6
19. Which disciple asked about Jesus' destination? (a) Judas (b) Peter (c) Thomas
20. Jesus is the way to the Father (a) True (b) False
21. We see God by believing in Jesus (a) True (b) False
22. See God only if _ (a) Big (b) Tall (c) Born again
23. We're born again by _ (a) Church (b) Baptism (c) Giving life to Christ
24. A good _ cares for sheep (a) Shepherd (b) Sheep (c) Military
25. Which is NOT a good shepherd quality? (a) Kindness (b) Protection (c) Fear
26. Who is a good shepherd? (a) Jesus (b) Thomas (c) Judas
27. 'I am the good shepherd...' Who said this? (a) Aboki (b) Jesus (c) Soldier
28. The bread of life is _ (a) Jesus (b) Manna (c) Loaf
29. Physical bread vs. spiritual satisfaction (a) True (b) False
30. Who said He is the living bread? (a) Peter (b) Paul (c) Jesus
B: 1. Before Jesus' ascension, He would prepare a _________ for His disciples.
2. Be _________ since no one knows when He will return.
3. A good _________ cares for the sheep.
4. The bread of life is _________ who came from God.
5. Jesus said, 'I am the _________ , the _________ , and the _________'.
C: 1. How can you prepare for Jesus' second coming?
2. What must we do to be born again?
4. How did Jesus prove He's a Good Shepherd?
